feed.title: Starfish |
feed.subtitle: Striving the Finest, Grandest and Highest

entry.title: Blogging my Aqua Life
entry.content:
Minor things about me

This article is a mere introduction that reveals minor things about me, the author of this page.

  1. I strive to be an engineer, not a computer scientist. Honestly, studying is one of the most unfriendly terms in my life. Instead, I enjoy making things that actually work, happen or attract people. I am currently a senior in Korea University(Seoul), majoring in Computer security.

  2. I am mostly interested in AI these days, but my interests are usually substituted with other subjects quite fast which also have a wide scope. I am not sure whether I am in a good shape, but my traits are so. My most recent studies are focused in web development, network security, hardware programming and artificial intelligence.

  3. Originally, I wasn’t a big fan in sharing my ideas or studies publicly and preferred working alone in the shadows. However I’ve recently found out that sharing knowledge is also a big part of fun in this computing world, thanks to one of my most beloved colleague.
